item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome Welcome to my personal blog. Here, you can find posts related to R, Statistics & Economics. My posts are also published on the official blog of Rsquared Academy and you can find posts on a variety of topics related to R there as well. This blog is built using blogdown and published on Netlify
